summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from West Alaska Street to West Juneau Street; by constructing watermains and hydrants with the necessary appurtenences,and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8219 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
